epd_metadata.pcr: PCR 2019:14 Construction Products. Version 1.1, c-PCR-003 Concrete and concrete elements (EN 16757). Version 2019-12-20

product_description.product_name: Hormigones con CEM I/B y árido reciclado H25 (Estándar, Agilia and Artevia), Hormigones con CEM II/B y árido reciclado H30 (Estándar, Agilia and Artevia), Hormigones con CEM II/B y árido reciclado H35 (Estándar, Agilia)
product_description.product_description: Holcim is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high-quality concrete, has projects and activities on road and network, collective housing.
product_description.un_cpc_code: 375 Articles of concrete, cement and plaster

lca_information.functional_unit: one m3 of ready-mix of concrete with a strength of 25 MPa, 30 MPa or 35 MPa which fulfils the requirements of technical behaviour referred to construction (strength and other technical characteristics) with a Reference Service Life of 100 years.
lca_information.time_representativeness: data from factory (primary data) is from 2019 and residual electricity mix from Spain in 2018
lca_information.system_boundaries: Cradle to grave and Module D (A+B+C+D)

transport.fuel_type: Truck of 16-32 tn. Fuel consumption: 31.1 L/100 Km

end_of_life.deconstruction_demolition: The use of diesel during the demolition process has been included.
end_of_life.transport_to_waste_processing: 16-32 tn truck. Fuel consumption: 25 L/100 Km, Distance: 50 km

carbon_emission_context.co2_uptake: CO2 fixed by carbonation of cement during the use phase has been included as required in c-PCR, following the methodology explained in EN 16757.

recycled_materials_handling.module_d: The results of recycling (avoided product) is crushed gravel.

additional_info.sustainable_development: Holcim develops its activity based on principles of sustainable development, focusing on management system, control environmental impact, contribution to the circular economy and transparent relationship with the environment.
additional_info.carbon_footprint: Holcim Spain has registered its carbon footprint for the years 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019.
additional_info.circular_economy: Holcim aims to reuse the value of waste as resources, maximizing its life cycle.
additional_info.quarry_restoration: Holcim has been working for more than 30 years for the restoration of its quarries to generate a net positive impact on biodiversity.
